'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* Can be shown to [Fyrna](/fyrna/) in [The Hole](/theHole/) (along with a check) to get the directions to [Delver's Row](/delversRow/) through [The Narrows](/theNarrows/).
* Can be shown to [Enoi](/enoi/) in [Enoi's Home](/enoisHome/), who tells you about Delver's Row, but says they do not know the directions there, pointing you in the direction of the tavern.
* Can be shown to [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/) in Delver's Row. This gives you access to [Dereo's Lair](/dereosLair/) in The Narrows.
* Can be shown to [Enarat](/enarat/), [Imuani](/imuani/), or [The Spindle Man](/theSpindleMan/) in Delver's Row, who both direct you towards Ernezzo.
* Can be shown to the Thugs guarding the lift down to the [Undercroft](/undercroft/) from Delver's Row to learn that access may only be granted by [Dereo the Lean](/dereoTheLean/).
